abstract: Toronto Maple Leafs, who have not won a Stanley Cup since 1967, are in first place in the Northeast Division, raising hopes that things may finally be different; right wing Phil Kessel leads the league in goals and points.
snippet: Toronto, which has not won a Stanley Cup since 1967, is in first place in its division, raising hopes that things may finally be different.
lead_paragraph: Toronto, which has not won a Stanley Cup since 1967, is in first place in its division, raising hopes that things may finally be different.

headline.main: Maple Leafs and Their Star Player Give Toronto Fans Reason for Hope
headline.print_headline: Maple Leafs and Their Star Player Give Toronto Fans Reason for Hope
headline.seo: Kessel and Maple Leafs Have Promising Start
